name: Dicey Dodge Ball
description:
Created under 48 hours for the GTMK-2022 Game Jam!

In this dicey game of dodge ball, dice actually decide your fate!

Can you beat the odds and make it past round 10?

How to Play

  • AD or ARROW keys to move
  • SPACE to jump

Credits

Game made by pingimingi22 and IsAMuffinNotAMuffin

Thanks so much to all the artists who provided these amazing free assets!

The 2 background assets are from freepik - https://www.freepik.com/:

Designed by Freepik:

Main menu background and cover image background: Locker room vector created by studio4rt - www.freepik.com

In-game background: School gym vector created by upklyak - www.freepik.com

Dodgeball image: ID 196320876 © Christos Georghiou | Dreamstime.com

Dice Image: By OuterCloudStudio from itch.io link: https://outercloudstudio.itch.io/pixel-dice-pack

Heart Image: Dansevenstar from https://opengameart.org/content/heart-pixel-art

Character by: Simple Pixel Art Character by Diego S. Seabra

Explosion by: Free Game Assets (GUI, Sprite, Tilesets) from https://free-game-assets.itch.io/11-free-pixel-art-explosion-sprites

Font: Arcadepix by Reekee of Dimenzioned from https://www.dafont.com/arcadepix.font

Sound effects by Swiss Arcade Game Entertainment, pack from https://phoenix1291.itch.io/sound-effects-pack-2

GameOverSound from godot docs "Your first 2D game" link: https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/getting_started/first_2d_game/index.html

Background music: By TEKNOAXE ROYALTY FREE MUSIC link: http://teknoaxe.com/Link_Code_3.php?q=1553 

Menu screen music: "Option Menu!" by HeatleyBros 

Game created by Pingimingi and IsAMuffinNotAMuffin
